languages.text: "Слышали последние новости? Говорят, с последней загрузкой на планете на нижних появилось много новичков. Интересно, это у нас мор в экипаже, раз решили восполнить недостаюших? В прошлый раз сизая проказа многих выкосила..."

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Слышали последние новости? Говорят очень много гостей прибыло на наш корабль

languages.text: "Have you heard? Apparently, the lower decks got a big influx of new blood after the last on-world resupply. Is there some pestilence spreading through the crew, and that's why we had to make up the shortfall? Last time it was blue leprosy that culled our ranks..."
languages.original_text: "Слышали последние новости? Говорят, с последней загрузкой на планете на нижних появилось много новичков. Интересно, это у нас мор в экипаже, раз решили восполнить недостаюших? В прошлый раз сизая проказа многих выкосила..."

traits.locale_text: "Have you heard? Apparently, the lower decks got a big influx of new blood after the last on-world resupply. Is there some pestilence spreading through the crew, and that's why we had to make up the shortfall? Last time it was blue leprosy that culled our ranks..."

"Have you heard? Apparently, the lower decks got a big influx of new blood after the last on-world resupply. Is there some pestilence spreading through the crew, and that's why we had to make up the shortfall? Last time it was blue leprosy that culled our ranks..."

"Have you heard? Apparently, the lower decks got a big influx of new blood after the last on-world resupply. Is there some pestilence spreading through the crew, and that's why we had to make up the shortfall? Last time it was blue leprosy that culled our ranks..."

languages.text: "Habt Ihr gehört? Die unteren Decks haben bei der letzten planetaren Nachschubaufnahme offenbar zahlreiche Neuzugänge erhalten. Haben wir vielleicht irgendeine Seuche in der Crew und mussten deswegen die Verluste ausgleichen? Letztes Mal hat die blaue Lepra unsere Reihen gelichtet ..."
languages.original_text: "Have you heard? Apparently, the lower decks got a big influx of new blood after the last on-world resupply. Is there some pestilence spreading through the crew, and that's why we had to make up the shortfall? Last time it was blue leprosy that culled our ranks..."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr gehört? Die unteren Decks haben bei der letzten planetaren Nachschubaufnahme offenbar zahlreiche Neuzugänge erhalten. Haben wir vielleicht irgendeine Seuche in der Crew und mussten deswegen die Verluste ausgleichen? Letztes Mal hat die blaue Lepra unsere Reihen gelichtet ..."

languages.text: « Vous avez entendu la dernière ? Apparemment, les ponts inférieurs ont accueilli beaucoup de nouveaux passagers lors du ravitaillement planétaire. Je me demande si c'était pour compenser des pertes. Est-ce qu'il y a encore une maladie contagieuse qui se propage parmi l'équipage ? La dernière fois, c'est la lèpre bleue qui a décimé nos rangs... »
languages.original_text: "Have you heard? Apparently, the lower decks got a big influx of new blood after the last on-world resupply. Is there some pestilence spreading through the crew, and that's why we had to make up the shortfall? Last time it was blue leprosy that culled our ranks..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez entendu la dernière ? Apparemment, les ponts inférieurs ont accueilli beaucoup de nouveaux passagers lors du ravitaillement planétaire. Je me demande si c'était pour compenser des pertes. Est-ce qu'il y a encore une maladie contagieuse qui se propage parmi l'équipage ? La dernière fois, c'est la lèpre bleue qui a décimé nos rangs... »

languages.text: “你听说了吗？在之前那个世界进行补给之后，底层甲板来了一大批新人。是不是船员之中爆发了什么瘟疫，所以咱们才要招募那么多人？上一次招募这么多人，还是蓝麻风病爆发那次……”
languages.original_text: "Have you heard? Apparently, the lower decks got a big influx of new blood after the last on-world resupply. Is there some pestilence spreading through the crew, and that's why we had to make up the shortfall? Last time it was blue leprosy that culled our ranks..."

traits.locale_text: “你听说了吗？在之前那个世界进行补给之后，底层甲板来了一大批新人。是不是船员之中爆发了什么瘟疫，所以咱们才要招募那么多人？上一次招募这么多人，还是蓝麻风病爆发那次……”

languages.text: 「聞いたか？前の惑星での再補給の後、下層デッキに新入りが大勢入ったらしい。クルーの間で疫病が流行っていて、それで人員不足を補わなきゃならなかったってことなのか？前回はブルー・ラプロシー病で仲間が死んだっけな…」
languages.original_text: "Have you heard? Apparently, the lower decks got a big influx of new blood after the last on-world resupply. Is there some pestilence spreading through the crew, and that's why we had to make up the shortfall? Last time it was blue leprosy that culled our ranks..."

traits.locale_text: 「聞いたか？前の惑星での再補給の後、下甲板に新入りが大勢入ったらしい。クルーの間で疫病が流行っていて、それが人員不足を補わなきゃならなかったって理由だったよな？前回はブルー・ラプロシー病で仲間が死んだっけな…」
「聞いたか？前の惑星での再補給の後、下層デッキに新入りが大勢入ったらしい。クルーの間で疫病が流行っていて、それで人員不足を補わなきゃならなかったってことなのか？前回はブルー・ラプロシー病で仲間が死んだっけな…」

languages.text: «¿Se ha enterado? Por lo visto, llegó mucha gente nueva a las cubiertas inferiores tras el último reabastecimiento del mundo. ¿Se estará extendiendo algún tipo de peste entre los miembros de la tripulación y por eso se ha tenido que cubrir la falta? La última vez fue la lepra azul la que diezmó nuestras filas...».
languages.original_text: "Have you heard? Apparently, the lower decks got a big influx of new blood after the last on-world resupply. Is there some pestilence spreading through the crew, and that's why we had to make up the shortfall? Last time it was blue leprosy that culled our ranks..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se ha enterado? Por lo visto, llegó mucha gente nueva a las cubiertas inferiores tras el último reabastecimiento del mundo. ¿Se estará extendiendo algún tipo de peste entre los miembros de la tripulación y por eso se ha tenido que cubrir la falta? La última vez fue la lepra azul la que diezmó nuestras filas...».

languages.text: "Duydunuz mu? Son dünya ikmalinden sonra alt güverteler resmen yeni eleman akınına uğramış. Mürettebatta salgın hastalık mı vardı da oluşan açığı kapatmak için miydi acaba? Geçen sefer maicüzzam, mürettebata ağır darbe indirmişti."
languages.original_text: "Have you heard? Apparently, the lower decks got a big influx of new blood after the last on-world resupply. Is there some pestilence spreading through the crew, and that's why we had to make up the shortfall? Last time it was blue leprosy that culled our ranks..."

traits.locale_text: "Duydunuz mu? Son dünya ikmalinden sonra alt güverteler resmen yeni eleman akınına uğramış. Mürettebatta salgın hastalık mı vardı da oluşan açığı kapatmak için miydi acaba? Geçen sefer maicüzzam, mürettebata ağır darbe indirmişti."
